title: Soar Into the Sky!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>I can’t wait to fly in your heli, Mari-chan~♪ Thanks for inviting me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>You’re welcome♪ You can ask me anytime.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ah, I see it! Waaah, it’s getting closer!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>They’re already here, huh♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hey, how many people do you think the heli fits?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Eh? Let’s see....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I wonder if it can fit an alpaca~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Eeeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I think they’ll love it if we take them somewhere open and let them run around. Can you give them a ride next time?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>T-, they definitely would fit~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
